## DropErc1155ClaimConditions class

Manages claim conditions for Edition Drop contracts

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DropErc1155ClaimConditions<TContract extends PrebuiltEditionDrop | BaseClaimConditionERC1155>
```

| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
